sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import Card from '../card.js';
import FlexContainer from '../flex-container';
import FlexItem from '../flex-item';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"flex-container"}}>{`Flex Container`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Flex Container give you options to control the flex properties of that element:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"inline"}}>{`Inline`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This props create a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`display: inline-flex`}</MDXTag>{` element`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer inline={true} style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 1
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 2
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 3
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 4
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 5
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"width"}}>{`Width`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This props defines the width of the flex element`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer width="300px" style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 1
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 2
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 3
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 4
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 5
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"height"}}>{`Height`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This props defines the height of the flex element`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer height="200px" style={{border: 'solid black thin'}}>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 1
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 2
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 3
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 4
  </FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>
    Flex Item 5
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`direction
wrap
flow
justify
alignItems
alignContent`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"playground"}}>{`Playground`}</MDXTag>

  <FlexItem>Flex Item 1</FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>Flex Item 2</FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>Flex Item 3</FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>Flex Item 4</FlexItem>
  <FlexItem>Flex Item 5</FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Card,FlexContainer,FlexItem}}>
  <FlexContainer>
    <FlexItem>
      Flex Item 1
    </FlexItem>
    <FlexItem>
      Flex Item 2
    </FlexItem>
    <FlexItem>
      Flex Item 3
    </FlexItem>
    <FlexItem>
      Flex Item 4
    </FlexItem>
    <FlexItem>
      Flex Item 5
    </FlexItem>
  </FlexContainer>
</Playground>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
